member.name: M:AngularAddin.Connect.OnConnection(System.Object,Extensibility.ext_ConnectMode,System.Object,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnConnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being loaded.
member.param: Root object of the host application.
Describes how the Add-in is being loaded.

member.name: M:AngularAddin.Connect.OnDisconnection(Extensibility.ext_DisconnectMode,System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnDisconnection method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the Add-in is being unloaded.
member.param: Describes how the Add-in is being unloaded.
Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:AngularAddin.Connect.OnAddInsUpdate(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnAddInsUpdate method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification when the collection of Add-ins has changed.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:AngularAddin.Connect.OnStartupComplete(System.Array@)
member.summary: Implements the OnStartupComplete method of the IDTExtensibility2 interface. Receives notification that the host application has completed loading.
member.param: Array of parameters that are host application specific.

member.name: M:AngularAddin.Connect.OnBeginShutdown(System.Array@)
